title: Upgrade on storage growth
snippet: Analyst upgrade cites strong growth in energy storage deployments and optimism on pipeline.

title: Tariff risk in key market
snippet: Proposed tariffs add risk and potential delay for imported components; management monitoring developments.

title: Recall probe update
snippet: Authorities continue recall investigation; added risk noted; timelines remain uncertain.

title: Deliveries surge ahead of quarter-end
snippet: Regional data point to a surge in orders; mix improving; management optimism.

title: Broker downgrade on valuation
snippet: Downgrade warns of valuation stretch despite strong long-term roadmap; recommends patience.

title: Factory delay risk
snippet: Suppliers indicate a delay risk at a facility; management expects limited impact.

title: Autonomy pilot expands
snippet: Company expands autonomy pilot in a new region; optimism around features despite regulatory scrutiny.

title: Margin decline amid pricing
snippet: Pricing actions weigh on margin; near-term weak tailwinds despite efficiency work.

title: Partnership expands on energy storage
snippet: Partnership expand to deploy grid-scale storage; win for interoperability and growth.

title: Partnership expands on charging
snippet: Company expands partnership on charging standards; win for interoperability.

title: Production ramp noted
snippet: Suppliers cite production ramp into quarter-end; risk of component delay remains modest.

title: Investigation watch
snippet: Regulators provide investigation update on software features; risk monitored.

title: Factory expansion progress
snippet: Construction milestones reached on factory expansion; utilization expected to improve later this year.

title: Broker upgrade on autonomy progress
snippet: Upgrade highlights progress; optimism around roadmap despite risks.

title: Loss on recall costs
snippet: Company records a small loss tied to recall costs; remediation underway.
